DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to evaluate the change of QuantiFERON-TB gold in tube assay (QFT) during the treatment of active tuberculosis.
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with active pulmonary tuberculosis are enrolled and, QFTs are performed for each subjects before treatment and 1, 3, 6 months after treatment. Investigators check the level of interferon-gamma, and reversion and conversion of this test.
DOC.criteria: All subjects with active tuberculosis Subjects who cannot complete study Subjects who have taken antituberculosis medication for more than a month before visit of our hospital
